Package com.leantegra.wibeat.sdk.monitoring.distance

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DistanceCalculator
    Interface DistanceCalculator provides basic functionality for distance calculation to WiBeat.
    RssiFilter
    Interface RssiFilter provides basic functionality for filtering RSSI values.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArmaRssiFilter
    Autoregressive-moving-average filter for filtering RSSI values.
    DefaultDistanceCalculator
    Calculate the distance between the Android device and WiBeat based on the measured RSSI value and a TX power calibration value at 1 meter.
    DynamicArmaRssiFilter
    Autoregressive-moving-average filter for filtering RSSI values what uses a accelerometer for a dynamic filtering level.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ProximityZone
    Describes relative distance between WiBeat and the device.
